channel.title: Need some help i got an error
channel.description: Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\includes\SRL\SRL.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\includes\SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling

item.title: Need some help i got an error
item.dc:creator: @M_A_I_N_FTW M_A_I_N_FTW
item.description:
@M_A_I_N_FTW wrote:

make sure you have subversion installed

then open Scar3.??>Tools>Option>SRL Download>Choses Subversion Repository> and then click check out, and if you want to see which rev you have, then click on check revision

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help i got an error

item.title: Need some help i got an error
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

You need to get SRL, I’m not sure but, You can get A version of it through file --> download SRL, But to get the latest revisions you’ll need to get svn or something, Look on srl-forums.com for something abotu it

Read full topic
